summary: Gaul invaded! Asterix must save the Druid Getafix from the Romans.
cast: Roger Carel|Jacques Morel|Pierre Tornade|Jacques Jouanneau|Lucien Raimbourg|Pierre Trabaud|Bernard Lavalette|Robert Vattier|Michel Puterflam|Maurice Chevit|Georges Carmier|Paul Angelis|Peter Butterworth|John Clive|Geoffrey Hughes|Henri Labussière|Richard Pearson|Terry Scott|John Wells
title: Astérix el galo
